content: CS Master's student at JHU. Previous experience in computer vision and software engineering. Bachelor's thesis proposes a constraint to better describe occlusion in the stereo matching problem using contour information. Now study ML, robotics, and computer graphics.
summary: CS Master's student at JHU. Previous experience in computer vision and software engineering. Bachelor's thesis proposes a constraint to better describe occlusion in the stereo matching problem using contour information. Now study ML, robotics, and computer graphics.
title: Hanwen Shen

summary: A Probabilistic Road Map path planner based on Obstacle Sampling, enabling narrow collision-free path planning for UR5 robot arm such as entering a car frame
title: UR5 Robot Path Planner

summary: A novel constraint to better describe the occlusion in the stereo matching optimization process using contour information, with the assumption that contours happen along with occlusion
title: Contour-based Stereo Matching

summary: Using Unity3d to demonstrate human pose, in another word, using human pose to drive virtual characters
title: Human Pose Estimation Based On Deep Learning

summary: A complete system featuring laser data visualization, processing, and storage, as well as motor controlling,  aimed at making optical axis calibration as simple as possible
title: Optical Axis Automatic Calibration System

summary: AI course project, using Decision Tree model and the data from 2007~2017 NBA MVP top three candidates to predict who should be the NBA MVP
title: Who should be the NBA MVP?
